rows.label: qst701301_msg0001
rows.name:
No matter how many times
you talk to me, I have no
intention of accepting.

rows.label: qst701301_msg0002
rows.name:
We don't even know when this place
might be attacked again. We don't
have the luxury to be so carefree...

rows.label: qst701301_msg0003
rows.name:
Ah, that's why, Sarah! In times like
these, when we don't know what will
happen! That's exactly why!!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0004
rows.name: Let's fall in love!! With me!!!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0005
rows.name: Aah, wait! At least let me hear this!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0006
rows.name: Why do you always look so sad!?

rows.label: qst701301_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes! It's as if you're trying to
suppress your true feelings.

rows.label: qst701301_msg0010
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]It's because you really, truly
don't listen to people, isn't it!?

rows.label: qst701301_msg0011
rows.name:
Aah, even your angry face is
lovely! My heart is pounding!!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0013
rows.name:
...I understand. If you're going to say
that much, then as proof of your love,
please bring me a Rainbow Blossom.

rows.label: qst701301_msg0014
rows.name: A flower? What a beautiful suggestion!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0015
rows.name:
However, isn't that
species already extinct?

rows.label: qst701301_msg0016
rows.name:
If you think so, then this
conversation is over.

rows.label: qst701301_msg0017
rows.name:
...No! It's not the end,
but the beginning!!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0018
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Sarah! This love I have for
you!! I will prove it to you!!
